ModMetaData.name: Save Our Ship (Reincarnated) !!INSTABLE!!
ModMetaData.author: Antharann Fireblade
ModMetaData.description:
Launched ships are saved to disk and can be landed on new worlds. Also allows building ships with interiors.
You can also send your ships into orbit and have a colony in space
!!WARNING!! HIGHLY INSTABLE, RIDDLED WITH BUGS!! CAN TEAR APART YOUR SHIP WITH THE ORBIT FEATURE!! !!WARNING!!
GitHub for error reports: https://github.com/FirebladeProduction/save-our-ship/tree/benwan Development Discord Server, modders welcome: https://discord.gg/9Xa4FKf
Based on Save Our Ship (Reloaded) by pipakin: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1541262111
